data.title: TASC (Total Administrative Services Corporation)
data.text:
Introducing (or re-introducing) the smart, easy and connected way to manage benefits.

The New MyTASC is a single sign-on platform that combines our Benefit Continuation Services (COBRA) with our Universal Benefit AccountÂ® offerings.

At TASC, we stay on top of the latest developments and HR trends to keep our customers informed about the regulations impacting their organization, and how best to offer a competitive benefit plan to their workforce. Check out our monthly schedule to register for one of our upcoming webinars.

It's easy to check your account balance, pay a bill, or submit a request for reimbursement with the TASC Mobile app. Check the links in the banner below and download the app today to stay connected 24/7.
